# `wrap_txt`

Wrap text


## Description

Wrap text


## Usage

```r
wrap_txt(..., sep = " ", strWidth = 100)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |     additional params to pass
`sep`     |     how to join elements of string (default is one space)
`strWidth`     |     externally set wrapping width. (default value of 100 is not effected)
